parameters: Ah, it's you! I wondered if I'd see you again, and who is this friend?
No, don't remember you at all.
Diary? I know nothing of the sort, lest you mean my tome of
But if you insit on pushing this matter, I'll have no choice but
to put you in your place.
Excellent, I remember studying your enchanted mechanical bird earlier,
Was there anything I can help you with?
No, don't remember you at all.
Too bad, allow me to introduce myself then. My name is Crowley,
but you can call me Aleister.
Was there anything I can help you with?
Are you still insisting on taking my Book?
